metadata.name: Kundalini Art #1 Special Edition
metadata.description:
Kundalini Art #1 Special Edition represents a symbolic meaning of our first spiritual project Kundalini Art, brought to you by the artists: sAMOyART, Joe Francis, Rogue Oasis, IvyNelsewhere, Treelana, SeeArt, Isola, Katherine Buglione, Mr.Pepper, MAHINTH. 
We have come together to shape the ASTRALnft – Awakening Spiritual Transcendental Rejuvenating Art League nft.
Kundalini energy initially refers to the sleeping serpent in every human, which could be awakened for spiritual enlightenment.  
There are several ways to awaken one’s kundalini energy, most of them are meditation, pranayama, asanas, mantras and slokas.  
Kundalini awakening accesses the inner energy that lies unused in us and helps us realize the nature of God, the world around us, and our connection to the planet Earth and the Universe.
Utility:  
1. The image can be used as a print.  
File: PNG RGB 5000x5155px 21.5MB.  
2. We can provide a spiritual session with our ASTRALnft team, where we can share our wisdom and vision
